DOC.brief_summary: entGlycemic control find improve clinical outcome follow Coronary Bypass Surgery . This study test hypothesis obtain tight glycemic control ( 80-120mg/dl ) oppose moderate control ( 120-180mg/dl ) improve outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Aggressive Versus Moderate Glycemic Control Diabetic Coronary Bypass Patients
DOC.detailed_description: 150 diabetic patient randomize achieve aggressive glycemic control ( 80-120mg/dl ) v moderate control ( 120-180mg/dl ) use intravenous insulin infusion begin anesthetic induction continue 18 hour follow surgery .
DOC.criteria: All diabetic patient undergo Coronary Bypass Surgery Patients hepatic renal failure
